title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content:
Ooog.

That is a long story; I shall have to digest it into little bits, a paragraph at a time perhaps, before I can cognate the entire text.
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Cute bunny!

title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content: Yes, it's screaming out to be paragraphed, chapterised, and put on a web page...

title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content: OH, I get it now, I thought it was a fan story heh.  I thought it started of unexpectedly well... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content:
Are you going to put the rest of the scans up? I've converted them to a .PDF file and it came out quite well (much easier to read) but of course I've only got pages 1-8.

If you want to e-mail me the rest of the scans in the same format as the others, I'll combine them all into the one document and put a link to it here - malvineous@shikadi.net

title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content:
Hey Malvineous I cant send you the last 2 downloads for some reason, they are being sent back to me.


[center] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-barf.gif[/img] [/center]

title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content:
Maybe they're too big - can you copy and paste the text from one of the bounces and e-mail that to me, so I can see if it's something I can fix at my end? (Make sure you don't include the attachment in that though, otherwise it'll just bounce again.)

Don't worry about zipping the files, it doesn't make them that much smaller, just send a couple of images per e-mail (keep it below 5MB total) and you should be okay.

title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content:
I sent you the test e-mail and it came back.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content:
Well that's weird. I am getting two copies of each of your e-mails though, the AOL mailserver is sending them through twice to the shikadi.net mailserver for some reason.

At any rate I now have pages 1-20. Not sure if you've gotten any of my replies...

title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content: A while ago I sent a test email, and didn't receive a bounce-back. Guess it's sorted itself out again.

title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content: Well I just discovered that the DNS server on shikadi.net had crashed, and since I had everything pointing to the local version of the "new" shikadi.net I hadn't noticed.  It's up and running now though, so hopefully everything should be working again.

title: Re: THE BooK oF id
content:
Righty-O, at last the entire lot of scans have been PDF'ed, so you can download the whole book here:

[url=http://www.shikadi.net/pckf/the_book_of_id.pdf]the_book_of_id.pdf[/url] (5.4MB)

I think it came out pretty well.
